title: [K-12] Online Science Learning Design Based on Cognitivism-Constructivism-Connectivism Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific theories and research methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: In-depth learning through STEPP model-based activity design and digital tool integration

learning_goals: To solve scientific problems, learners can visualize their thinking processes using concept-mapping tools based on cognitive principles.
Applying a constructivist approach, learners can collaborate with peers to generate and verify scientific hypotheses, organizing them into digital portfolios.
Following connectivist principles, learners can share scientific knowledge in online communities (research forums, expert networks) and experience knowledge creation processes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
